dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: we will start using green blocks

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: i need you to build 4 green blocks straight from where you are standing, all on the ground

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: now i need you to put a green block on either side of the second existing block, on the ground

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: they need to be attached to the same block, preferable to the one closer to you

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: so it looks like a cross

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: now, i need you to place a block diagonal from one of those new blocks, in the forward direction

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: now we are done with the green

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: can you place a red block above the 4 greens with a space in between the green line and the new block?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: just need 1 block space in between the green and the new red block

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: now can you place 4 yellow blocks on each flat side of the red block?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes it is, you are very observant builder

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: to finish, we need 4 orange blocks to fill in the corners of the 3x3 head of the flower

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: good job builder, we have successfully completed our mission!
